Articles.Content: Since the RAPIER engines automatically switch over to rocket mode when the air gets too thin and since you can also switch mode via action groups, what is the point of closing intakes?  Are there any advantages to doing so with any of the engines?

4 minutes ago, Klapaucius said:

what is the point of closing intakes?

Currently, I don't think there is one. Historically it made a significant difference to aerodynamic drag because the aero model was utterly silly.

Then again, I haven't played with the stock (old or new) non shape-based aero model much at all, so I don't know what drag values Squad decided to give intakes at the moment.
Just to add another button to the UI I guess...
It's a relic of previous ages, as steve_v said. It serves no purpose currently. It just never got removed from the UI.
